name: TD SYNNEX Corporation
summary: TD SYNNEX Corporation is a leading global distributor and solutions aggregator for the information technology ecosystem, providing a broad range of technology products, services, and solutions to partners and customers worldwide. Formed from the merger of Synnex and Tech Data, the company operates with approximately 23,000 employees and reported over $62 billion in annual revenue. Headquartered in Fremont, California, TD SYNNEX is publicly traded under the ticker SNX and is ranked No. 64 on the 2023 Fortune 500 list.
